When Address and Search bar are separated by bookmark resizing of address bar and search bar is not possible.

After moving the bookmarks toolbar items, to the right of the search bar, resizing becomes possible. The repositioning does not save for a firefox restart.

Reproducible: Always

Steps to Reproduce:
1. Place "Bookmark Toolbar Items" between the address bar and search bar. (bookmark toolbar items should be filled with several links as to run across the screen and have a drop down menu)
Actual Results:  
see details.

Expected Results:  
add more resizing capabilites, and save the size when bookmarks are introduced.

comments.raw_text: Let me clarify the persistence problem.  If you put the bookmark toolbar item on the same bar as the address bar and then resize the address bar enough to shrink the bookmark item and then restart firefox, the bookmark item will go back to the size it started at.  And the first part of my bug is a duplicate of bug 403959.
